name: AWS Lambda
description: AWS Lambda is a zero-administration compute platform for back-end web developers that runs your code for you in the AWSu0026nbsp;cloudu0026nbsp;and provides you with a fine-grained pricing structure. AWS Lambda runs your back-end code on its own AWS compute fleet of Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instances across multiple Availability Zones in a region, which provides the high availability, security, performance, and scalability of the AWS infrastructure.
